entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
